Get NFL odds for a specific game from ESPN's API

Source: R/get_nfl_odds.R
get_nfl_odds.Rd

Get NFL odds for a specific game from ESPN's API

get_nfl_odds(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

character

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get odds from a specific game
get_nfl_odds(game_id = "400791550")

#> # A tibble: 6 × 14
#>   odds_source  odds_source_id spread_team spread over_under location    ml   odds
#>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>        <dbl>      <dbl> <chr>    <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1 consensus    1004           SEA -4.5       4.5       NA   away        NA   NA  
#> 2 consensus    1004           SEA -4.5       4.5       NA   home        NA   NA  
#> 3 numberfire   1003           SEA -3.5       3.5       41.5 away      -180   54.1
#> 4 numberfire   1003           SEA -3.5       3.5       41.5 home       160   45.9
#> 5 teamrankings 1002           SEA -3.5       3.5       41.5 away      -177 -101  
#> 6 teamrankings 1002           SEA -3.5       3.5       41.5 home       159 -109  
#> # … with 6 more variables: win_proj_fpi <dbl>, team_name <chr>, team_abb <chr>,
#> #   team_full <chr>, team_logo <chr>, game_id <chr>
